data.content:
Anh - Anh
hypercorrection
■ noun the use of an erroneous word form or pronunciation based on a false analogy with a correct or prestigious form, such as the use of I in he invited my husband and I to lunch.
Derivatives
hypercorrectadjective

sentences.en: That's a hypercorrection, and you don't look any smarter for using it.
sentences.vi: Đó là một sự điều chỉnh quá mức và cậu chẳng trông thông minh lên chút nào khi sử dụng nó.
